definitions.definition: A period of time before an event occurs; the act of delaying; procrastination ; lingering inactivity.
examples: the delay before the echo of a sound

definitions.definition: An audio effects unit that introduces a controlled delay.
Synonym of promise ( “ object representing delayed result ” ) .
An amount of time provided on each move before one's clock starts to tick ; a less common time control than increment .

main_definition: A period of time before an event occurs; the act of delaying; procrastination ; lingering inactivity.
secondary_definitions: ( music ) An audio effects unit that introduces a controlled delay.
( programming , Clojure ) Synonym of promise ( “ object representing delayed result ” ) .
( chess ) An amount of time provided on each move before one's clock starts to tick ; a less common time control than increment .
